title: Facing an issue on random video forward/backward click and pinch zoom on YouTube.
content:
In YouTube on randomly clicking anywhere in the timeline to make the video move forward/backward to the exact time, it seems not working in pixel4a(but on dragging,it works), but the same works on other mobiles. 
And sometimes pinching for zoom in/out the video isn't working. 
Does anyone facing those issues?

please let me know the solution as no current updates available for YouTube.
